api/index.html.title: Overview | BRIDGES.McNeel Documentation
api/index.html.keywords: Overview BRIDGES.McNeel is based several namespaces: BRIDGES.McNeel.RhinoCommon : Contains conversion and extension methods between BRIDGES and RhinoCommon types. BRIDGES.McNeel.Grasshopper : Contains conversion and extension methods between BRIDGES and Grasshopper types.

articles/intro.html.title: Overview | BRIDGES.McNeel Documentation
articles/intro.html.keywords: Overview The article section contains details on the content of the framework and tutorials on how to use it in your projects.

index.html.title: Welcome on the homepage of BRIDGES.McNeel. | BRIDGES.McNeel Documentation
index.html.keywords: Welcome on the homepage of BRIDGES.McNeel . BRIDGES.McNeel is a framework developped by l'Ecole des Ponts ParisTech and its Build'in platform. It is based on the BRIDGES framework and is intended to provide conversions of types from BRIDGES to types from RhinoCommon and Grasshopper

README.html.title: BRIDGES.McNeel | BRIDGES.McNeel Documentation
README.html.keywords: BRIDGES.McNeel Tools from the Build'in platform for Rhino and Grasshopper
